data.title: Tamasha Season 3: Meet The First Wazeer And Star
data.meta_description: The wait is finally over as the much-anticipated tamasha season 3 has kicked off. The show that has managed to captivate audiences ...
data.text:
Pakistan’s most popular reality TV series, Tamasha, is back with a bang & stepping up its game. Find out the official contestant lineup here:

The wait is finally over as the much-anticipated Tamasha season 3 has kicked off. The show that has managed to captivate audiences with its unique blend of drama, entertainment, and controversy is back to enthrall viewers once again. The mastermind behind the chaos, the inimitable Adnan Siddiqui, returns as the Badshah, promising to stir the pot and keep the contestants on their toes. His signature style and witty remarks have become synonymous with the show, making him an integral part of its success. With a fresh batch of 18 contestants vying for the title, the lineup promises to be as exciting as ever.

The previous seasons of Tamasha were nothing short of a phenomenon. The show managed to create a buzz like no other, with its contestants becoming household names. From the unexpected twists and turns to the high-octane drama, the show kept viewers hooked. The first season crowned Umer Aalam as the ultimate champion, while Arooba Mirza emerged victorious in the second season.

Who will form alliances, who will clash, and who will emerge as the ultimate survivor? Can we expect plenty of heated arguments, backstabbing, and tears, all under the watchful eye of the ever-entertaining Badshah? From cooking challenges and cleaning duties to mind-boggling tasks and the infamous Wazeer race, the contestants will be put through their paces. Let the games begin!

First Wazeer Of Tamasha Ghar Season 3

Noman Habib became the inaugural Wazeer of Tamasha Ghar, takes the reins with a promise of unparalleled entertainment. Let’s expect a whirlwind of laughter, unexpected turns, and a house brimming with the infectious energy of his comedic genius.

But wait, let’s take a look at this season’s lineup!

1. Emaan Fatima

Emaan Fatima, the first contestant of Tamasha, is a talented musical artist known for her voice and versatile singing style.

2. Saima Baloch

Saima Baloch is an actress and she is known for her performances in various television dramas.

3. Ayaz Samoo

Ayaz Samoo is a versatile Pakistani actor, comedian, and writer.

4. Anam Tanveer

Anam Tanveer is a talented Pakistani actress and television host.

5. Noman Habib

Noman Habib is a Pakistani actor known for his energetic performances in television dramas and films.

6. Mahnoor Pervaiz

Mahnoor Pervaiz is an emerging Pakistani actress.

7. Sheharyar Shahid

Sheharyar Shahid is an actor, model, and content creator.

8. Humna Naeem

Humna Naeem is a content creator and influencer.

9. Arslan Khan

Arslan Khan is an actress, model, and the husband of renowned actress Hira Khan.

10. Zoyaa Khan

Zoyaa Khan is a fashion model and content creator

11. Wajeha Khan

Wajeha Khan is an artist and model.

12. Abdullah Ejaz

Abdullah Ejaz is a fashion model, actor, and athlete.

13. Dania Enwer

Dania Enwer is an actress known for her engaging performances in television dramas and films.

14. Junaid Akhtar

Junaid Akhtar is an actor and Pakistani model.

15. Mani Liaqat

Mani Liaqat is a Manchester-based British-Asian actor and comedian.

16. Mahi Baloch

Mahi Baloch is an actress and model.

17. Agha Talal

Agha Talal is a Pakistani television actor.

18. Malik Aqeel

Malik Aqeel is an actor and fashion model.

So, who are you rooting for? Let us know in the comments!
